name: Deborah Maragopoulos
what_you_do: Intuitive Integrative Nurse Practitioner specializing in neuro-immune-endocrinology, helping patients balance hormones and reach optimal wellness through natural therapies.
who_you_serve: Individuals and families seeking hormone balance and natural healing therapies.
social_proof: Masters in Nursing from UCLA, Board Certified Family Nurse Practitioner (ANCC since 1988), past president of the California Coalition of Nurse Practitioners, clinical endocrine advisor to Genova Laboratory and Sansum Medical Clinic, known as the Hormone Queen®, speaker at American College of Nurse Practitioners, published author.
signature_programs: Genesis Gold® (nutraceutical supplement), Sacred Seven™, Gen-Pro, Hormones in Harmony® (book), The Hypothalamus Handbook (book), Menopause Action Plan™ (book), LoveDance®: Awakening the Divine Daughter (book), LoveDance® of the Magdalen (book), 90 Day Healing Success Program, Root Healing Consultation, DMAR Pyramid of Health™
business_focus: Helping individuals balance their hormones through integrative nurse practitioner services, nutraceutical supplements, and natural healing therapies.
service_provided: Integrative nurse practitioner consultations, nutraceutical supplements (Genesis Gold, Sacred Seven, Gen-Pro), Root Healing Consultation, 90 Day Healing Success Program, books, speaking engagements
